pages.text: These $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Focused-Enchantable-Books)Books/$ Will Only Accept 1 Enchant when used in an enchanting table / Exp Enchanter.$(br)Due to the nature of these books, they can only be combined with items using the Exp Anvil Upgrade.

pages.title: Book Area
pages.text: Apart From the 3 Enchantments Above, this is the only enchantment that can benefit from being 'Over Combined' with the Exp Anvil setup.$(br)An example for this is the ability to increase the AOE of the quarry above the soft cap of 13xRANGEx13

pages.title: Book Advanced
pages.text: This Item is the only item in game able to be enchanted with the Advanced Enchantment using the Exp Enchanter or other suitable enchanter that can enchant at level 92 or above.

pages.title: Pack Makers
pages.text: Modpack makers, if you do not want players to have the ability to use the Advanced Enchantment, you may remove the recipe for this item and it should remove any way to get the enchantment in game.
